imagePrompt: A medium shot in the distinctive claymation art style, set in a celestial palace environment. The background features stylized clay clouds and subtly ornate architectural elements, suggesting a heavenly realm. 西王母 (Queen Mother of the West), a majestic and benevolent female deity wearing elaborate celestial robes and a dignified headdress, is gracefully extending her hand, presenting a small, spherical object. The object, the elixir, is the focal point: it is rendered in a translucent, crystalline clay material, emitting a soft, mysterious inner glow that casts ethereal light on their figures. 后羿 (Hou Yi), the robust male figure in traditional attire, stands before her, his body language conveying deep respect and a touch of awe as he reaches out to receive the precious gift. The atmosphere is magical, reverent, and full of quiet power.
